mapper.update: update b_outpay_detail set keyid=keyid ,outpayid=#{outpayid} ,rowno=#{rowno} ,billid=#{billid} ,price=#{price} ,amount=#{amount} ,brief=#{brief} where keyid=#{keyid}

update b_outpay_detail set keyid=keyid ,outpayid=#{outpayid} ,rowno=#{rowno} ,billid=#{billid} ,price=#{price} ,amount=#{amount} ,brief=#{brief} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and outpayid=#{Where_outpayid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and billid=#{Where_billid} and price=#{Where_price} and amount=#{Where_amount} and brief=#{Where_brief}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.outpayid "outpayid", t.rowno "rowno", t.billid "billid", t.price "price", t.amount "amount", t.brief "brief" from b_outpay_detail t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.outpayid "outpayid", t.rowno "rowno", t.billid "billid", t.price "price", t.amount "amount", t.brief "brief" from b_outpay_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.price=#{price} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.brief=#{brief}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.outpayid "outpayid", t.rowno "rowno", t.billid "billid", t.price "price", t.amount "amount", t.brief "brief" from b_outpay_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.price=#{price} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.brief=#{brief}
mapper.delete: delete from b_outpay_detail where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and outpayid=#{Where_outpayid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and billid=#{Where_billid} and price=#{Where_price} and amount=#{Where_amount} and brief=#{Where_brief}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.outpayid "outpayid", t.rowno "rowno", t.billid "billid", t.price "price", t.amount "amount", t.brief "brief" from b_outpay_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.price=#{price} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.brief=#{brief}

select count(*) from b_outpay_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.price=#{price} and t.amount=#{amount} and t.brief=#{brief}
